Blog.post: erm..testing, don't say i broke it again

am on phone to charlo, luke jm is a major perv!! for drama he jad to 'cuddle' me cus i played his mother (long story) his hand kept wandering u know where at the back, and his eyes too when he pretended to cry on my shoulder. i feel soo sad doing this for some reason, i'm totally neglecting chrlo here, oh well, she has eastenders to keep her company, so would i but the fottie match is on tv so my dads watching
woo-hoo, it worked, its like my 3rd attempt at keeping a blog, i'm just no good at diary type things :(

how! (raises hand) cousins are round house - i missed eastenders yesterday!! and dan came back! how stoopid am i ?!?!?!?!?!?! the eldest one of em is prancin about in my sketchers acting like the other 2's long lost mother. The other two are eating ice-cream getting it everywhere and trying to colour in at the same time, trust me its not working out for them
lol, i know's is pointless going back and making another post, but its fun

lmao, today was one of the funniest days ever thanks guys for staying with me (no one's even reading this but it makes me feel a hell of a lot better!) ok, so the radom ppl who go on my profile to find out who i am mite, but they probs don't even know who half the ppl i'm talkin about r

sorry, had to close that one because of prw(u know wot i mean) Rite now i can tell the whole story of what happened, Charlo told her that tom said that the two girls he would neva eva go out with was me and jools (actually, it was her and jools so she was saying all of this about her self) any way, she said that it was understandable beacause going out with me would be like one of us lot going out with horvath ow BIATCH!!! she compared me to horvath, wtf?!?!?!?!? she can bloody talk, i know i'm not very pretty but jesus! does she even knwo what a mirror and hairbrush is?
uh-oh, i think the crush is back, and it's not good for lots of reasons i could throttle loz rite now, she won't read this, thank -god!
lmao, that last one took a few secs longer to be published cus its too 'large'

evryone's gone out except me (and lauren) and i'm really lonely cus she's eating her din dins, btw the time is messed up on this its like half 7. Boredom is really kicking in now, i'm even thinking about resorting to calling the guys, which i haven't done for a long time cus my mum gets 'suspicious' over nothing. whenever a guy is mentioned she gives me the lecture about how boys can have bad things on their mind, der, thats what makes them male, anyway, she doesn't like the idea of me having a boyfriend too early, whoops- too late. Vh1 is depressing me - help must.......pick up.........phone.......and.........call.......some one. damn it i will not call the guys, the conversations now r really awkward for some reason, either they'r still holding the grudge that their not 'cool enough' for us (sam made that all up btw) or they fancy jools and clare and if they talk to me then some how i'll know and it'll be the end of the world :S wow, this is suprisingly theraputic! who knew it. rite u can now tell when i've been majorly bored - therell be a blog entry=D

if u read own all of my blog, it makes me out to be quite a freak - no change there then , lmao :P so hot, so bored, wot now? OH MY GODD!! AHHHHHHAAAAAHAAAHAAHAAAH!!! soz - janice moment! i worry about my self sometimes, where was i ? ah yes, my dad was yelling at me for spending way to much time on msn and i wasn't listening (too busy listening to N*E*R*D - fly or die *this is a subliminal message, buy the album*) so he eventually got bored, gave up and plonked his ass on the sofa to watch tv =D the simple life of my family omg, i'm supposedly ment to find my highschool (secondary school, same thing) love 2moz, yer rite! not a chance !! wait hold on......take that back
wow! i feel like a kind of match maker- only not (it's like learned, only not - LMFAO jools!). erm...ok, thats all i wanted to say ...for now.....well..actually.........no.....aaah screw it!

i like panties and i cannot lie, u other clothes can't deni, when some pants walk in with a iddy biddy lace and a round thing in ur face u get.............under wear! (wot the hell were u thinkin u freak?!?!) ewww, sweat marks, have teachers never heard of deodrant?, g2g, heheheheheheh, tis funny
howdi, in english rite now, hiya mel who keeps reading over my shoulder, erm.........wot do i do now?
its sooooooooooo nice n sunny outside, so i'm stuck inside. great.
today nearly went to drayton manor, but couldn't in the end cus stoop mum couldn't give a lift
erm...i think i brokeded it:S
a big HELLO to kate, clare, charlotte, mel and n e others who obviously don't trust me:D
I am pissed off. **** r either tryin to mess with our heads, or his - surprise suprise

lmao, the cheer we have to learn is soo funny! taa to evryone who spomsored me for the record attempt. got more training 2nite and i'm stuck for a lift :S - uh-oh!! so much stuff i wanna write, but can't ,lol

LMAO, i don't think i've ever laughed so hard and so much, i nearly wet my self there n then. *imitates puting pen down trousers* (LMAO JOOLS) we discovered just how spazzy mrs. foster really is - harraging? what, german, french and the wierdly fake scottish accent wasn't enough so u had to go and make up some of ur own words? ok, need to get a new sponsor form thingy, it's nearly run out :S some thought it wud be funny to chuck our bags off the desk and send them to another side of the classroom - i think they need to understand what 'getting a life is'. apparently it was harris. lets leave it at that. today was filled with dirty jokes, but very very funny ones about fit fit guys :P i think theres some ppl that r really pissed off at me, but i don't know for sure yet so i'm going to wait and see. i must go now, actually i don't have to, but i'm bored so, ye, bye p.s wudn't we all luv to be that pen jools, wudn't we all ;)

lmao, my arm is now officially covered in pen, one line round my wrist is by me but the rest is by some one who i can't mention - JOOLS :( i miss art 2moz cus of this stoopid athletics thing, which if its girls and boys, then i'm screwed cus some ppl from my old school will be there. Omg, staying after school is so much fun!! u just mess about, its like lunch hour only longer and more fun with less ppl.
lmao, appently my blog makes no sense, and its all in a 'code'. well i suppose it is sort of, but not if u know me well ;)
ok, i got this one, it probably wud've been a little better when we didn't doodle on it, but oh well, (left to right - lucy, me, charlo) urlLink urlLink
us lot from KGPS, hopefully i'll get one from bablake!! urlLink urlLink

omg, last nite at the battle of the bands, m**k (a.ka **) was there and he was playing in this band, (forgotton which one) and he was lookin fiiiiiiiiine!n e wayz, i was to embarrassed to say ne thing cus i thought, oh god, i'm gonna sound stupid ain't i? nd then jools turned round and sed the same thing, i was like WOAH, same wave length or what, nd then zain tickled me today, which i'm a bit scared about to The bloody paper hasn't printed our piccy's of the netball team yet, (bastards, i'll get them while they're sleeping) and they sed it would be in around this week some time. mel and charlo and clare and loz and lu had a fall out, well actually, they just ran away from mel, and ye, u can guess she'd be upset, who wouldn't? i kno i've done it in the past, but i've sed sorry and its all over and forgiven. charlo supposedly doesn't care cus she was gettin really pissed off at her, loz felt really bad about it so she went and appologised. And all that time me and jools were off in our own little fairy land of fit fit guys =D g2g, post later, (no one's reading but hey, wotcha gonna do?)

mmmmmmmm mmmmmmmm , nd this time its about a guy ;) bless, he's so cute, i don't think he's had much sleep lately, :O omg! battle of the band 2moz!! can't wait, goin bak to jools nd watchin a film then goin to school for the battle of the bands thingy, (fingers crossed he'll be there)

oh my god, joolsey, look at his butt, it's soo nice, he looks like one of those those ass models lmao, taa sir-mix-alot!!( not my fault *** has a nice tuschy) omg i think there's these two ppl that r pissed off at me at the mo, aah well, screw them!:O today at lunch was soooo funny we decided to hav a little play at thier own game............heh heh heh :| mr. atwal reeeeeeeeks, can some one plz accidentally spray him with deodrant, there's always one teacher isn't there?!?! ok, all did, POWER TO THE TUSCHY!! and shall it always be there, amen
i will get ma revenge!! urlLink urlLink

JJ!!!! u silly fool! it mite b sweet to call up ur gf at 6 30 in the mornin, but to me, some one who usually gets up at 7 20, it's annoyin. lol, gud mornin to u too jayj! lmao, i got moved in german just for drawin on jools arm, not my fault she left out in my view line, if u think about it, she was just askin for me to draw on it, ye.... lucky my breasts are small and humble so u don't confuse them with mountains?!?! WTF!? lol, i think she was high when recordin and writing that track

k, me nd ma mum went to hav a maccy d's afta cheeleadin. we were eatin when we heard this big comotion, this tramp had walked off with this lil' girls happy meal toy , bless her, nd all he had to say 4 himself was, 'oh sorry darlin, i dunno what happened', out of all the things in there, he went for the toy:S then he got chucked out by this massive bouncer like guy who turned out to be the lil' girls dad! poor thing was well scared then, she kept gettin all parranoid, so they gav her another toy, she didn't let that one slip past her, lol!
jj!!, lol, ur barn door's open mate!, luv ya, xxx urlLink urlLink
wooooooooooo! he asked me out! nd i sed yes! lol, he deserves to be put on here, brb

i never realised how goooooooooorgeous rhubarb pie nd custard is till today, *drools* i havn't had it in years, nd i had it today, yummy yummy yummy i got pie in my tummy, it's scrummy cus its mixed in with custard! lmao my pottery figure has gone sooo wrong, it's head is too heavy let alone with the added weight of the hat on top! jayj is on hols! damn him, i kno i only met him once, but he's soooo fit imagine a mix between, the bassist from McFly and orlando bloom :D makes me a very happy chappy indeed i feel like flirting, lol, i'm on a natural high for no reason, mayb thats y i hav a really strong urge to flirt, lmao if i get desperate, there's always lee - the straight version of tom, lol big day ahead 2moz, rounders tournement followed by netball practice, nd i get to sit n loz's boot on the way to netball training - my life long dream, to sit in the boot of her car. lol, not really, my life long dream is to marry jayj, own a farm which makes money by sybsidies cus it's rich in copper or something so all i hav to do is ride my pink tra'or with lather interior and dice in the window with a heavy soundsystem and hav a couple of those lawnmower car things so that i can race all ma mates down the motorway nd piss off all the other drivers, nd if they yell abuse or swear at us, u can just threaten to run em over! *deep sigh* all did, i think, oh wait, nearly forgot the rubba chickidies instead of real ones cus they cost too much, specially as i'm a vegi! lol, i think charlo's email's broke, she tried to send an email to me like 3 times, nd it didn't work bye,

OMG! eastenders, i don't care n e more, all the cool ppl hav eaither gone, or died, sept cwith parker (it's not a typo btw:P)i don't care about natalie nd martin nd their stoopid weddin. GET SOME NEW STORYLINES!! i got an owwi:( the rounders ball rebounded off my shoe onto my leg, now i hav a bruise, nd it hurts! is miss. james preggers or has she just ate too much cream pie ova da hols? must kill McGonnagon! will kill McGonnagon! LMAO sam ( the one nd only samsta)

L M F A O!!!, the funniest day eva, i'll start from the top. rite i got woken up by mum who sed 'oh btw, we're going into school 2day, not 2morrow, so if u want a friend to come, u better call them'. i eventually got up nd went downstairs, did mundane things then rang jools, c if she still wanted to come, she was still sleepin (bless, the poor thing) lool, i kinda accidentally woke her up. we were on the way to pick her up (about 10 sommet by now) nd we were goin round the bend in the road, nd these girls ran past so we had to swerve to avvoid killin em, later i turned round to find out it clare, charlo, lu, loz nd mel. my mum nearly killed them! we picked up jools, and were on our way bak, we saw the guys still standin there, they were waitin for a bus. we got to school, nd we just messed around in the playground, they'd done it all up since i had last been. They had these really cool speaker type things, like u know the can on a string thing, like that only with a red green and blu tube instead. i wanna b a 5 yr old again!! i got in touch with my inner child, lmao. then my mum asked us to sort this cupbaord out, but i kept gettin distracted by all of the things in the nursary( including the bubbles)i dunno how jools managed to do it, she actually did work, i hav the attention span of a 2 yr old, lol my mum really likes her now, cus she did lots of 'hard work', she even got called a 'good girl' lmao, now thats praise for ya!;) we then went to pik up my dad, so that we cud all go to get the new car. we finally got there, (we were gonna meet jj but he broke his leg, awwwww, get well soon babes!) i swear it was cursed from the start. 1. it wudn't start 2. it wudn't move 3. the boot didn't open 4. we were driving illegally cus there was no road tax on it 5. we had a crash! ok, going into the crash in more detail. we were at the roundabout near the nuneaton cinema nd franki nd bennies, and we stopped to wait to go. all of a sudden me jools nd my dad go flyin forwards, the stoopid idiot crashed into the bak of us, we cudn't report it cus there was no road tax on it so they might think we had been driving it illegally for ages nd we'd get into trouble wid da police. we turned round nd guess who the stoopid idiot was - my mum!! she had been going 20 mph for the whole way, then she suddenly dicides to rev it up, nd crash into our new car, then we got home nd found out she had not only cracked the license plate in 2places, but scrathced it nd loosened the bolts on the front of the audi!! SILLY FOOL! we got home, had a laugh, ate some maccy d's nd watched findin nemo all culed up my duvet, lol, cud life get n e betta!:P bye

rite well i'm confused. apparently, i've done something to really offend mel nd make her hate me, and jools, and i think evryone else hates me too - it's a loose loose situation. great. tryin not to go on msn, but it's pointless, i'm addicted to the damn thing. so i've made a comprimise, i'll go on it, but if n e one in our class is online, then i'll scidadle. ok, hopefully gonna go shoppin for fuso stuff (i kno thats not how u spell it, but i really can't be assed to look it up) omg, i saw this really freaky look alikey of tom today at the insurance place. we ( me nd my dad) went to this car auction to look for a car for my bro, and this really hot guy, that i liked caught me lookin at him, and just as we were goin, i thought he touched my ass, i later found out, it was better than that. He had slipped me his number and his name, but i really don't wanna call him, cus i'm kinda scared that he's gonna be like loads older than me. lool, a big hi to the fat doods that were racin each other on the mikes, i think tony won!! LMAO at the the guy who was auctioneering via opera! u rule!! ok, all did for today, well, hopefully. i haven't been out wid my dad properly for ages. nd if things go my way, it'll hapen alot more!;) lool, jools is the probs the only one who reads this so, bye jools, talk to ya later *~xxx~*

rite, well apparently, some things up with one of my 'friends', but i neva got to find out what it was. sneeky suspicions kickin in. OMG 3 DAYS!!!!! cain't wait, pool, b-ball net, ppl i ain't seen for ages. RAJ bhoue, the most funniest person i kno!( well in ma family) y is so miserable here, the weather cold nd dull, no one's doin n e thing, actually, thats a ie, cus i'm doin omethin, 2 moz involvin shrek 2 nd brightly coloured face masks, PML bored, bored, bored, bored, bored!
is it just me or does it play a vital role in our lives? seriously, think about it, THINK ABOUT IT!!!!!
ok, freakin out now, 4 DAYS!!!! WOOOOOOOO WOOOOOOOOO!!! bored, can't b bothered to go pack. or do n e thing for that matter !

LMAO, PML!!! the concert last nite, embarrassed and pissin maself at the same time, neva before, nd neva again. they shall neva look at an audience in trhe same way again!! rite, from the top. we got there, nd the backing singers were seriously dragging on. then this weird dancer lady came out, nd ppl started booing cus they wanted sonu (the guy who's concert it was)nd this one lady threatened to beat down the guy in charge with her shoes (jay, shut up or mena tho chuppal marna!!) so evry1 that tried to come on stage got yelled at. i have aslo offcially disowned my dad, he started most of it off, especially ppl asking for their refunds. then he finally comes on afta 2 hours of waiting. his excuse : i was told 9 oclock not 7 oclock. oh well, it was a good show, nd v.v.v. funny too. this small boy fell asleep on the front row, so he had a go at him, he sed, " u waited 2 hours for me to come so that u could fall asleep. the boys punishment - to dance. LMAO sonu's words " just for that, ur gonna dance" (ok, mebbe not the EXACT words, but near enough) then this other little boy came out of nowhere and sed that he felt left out and that he wanted to dance on stage too! so there was a mini competion to see who could dance best. the theme tune went - GO SMALL BOY, GO CHOOTOU a sehr funny evenin'!!!! bye!!! (ps, jools, cain't wait for the MARATHON ;)lmao, i have the mask ready nd the chocolate) always remember my children, god is with you!! HALLALUJAH!!
oh great, a day out in leicester, then to some random guys concert - all with my family!! (if u ask me, it's just an excuse to go shopping) HAPPY B-DAY NOOP 4 2MOZ!!! the big three o!!:O:O:O:O:O

WOO-HOO!!! we got the world record yesterday!! *oh ye, go us* lol, as u can guess, majorly bored - bored bored bored bored. i wanna go to drayton mannor 2moz, cus i cudn't make it last time. 'm not so sure that the ppl goin actually want me there seeing as how tom and luke smith came before me on the 'to invite' list. aah well, kinda used to it from them now. my cousins asked me to go down to theirs for a week before i go to florida (again, WOO-HOO! can't wait) but f we are goin to drayton manor, well actually, f 'm goin, cus the rest of them will some how manage to go probably, then i can't go down to wolves with ma cousin. What to do? *sighs* omg, i was watching this indian film (jaya, kuch kuch hotai hai, lmao, anjaliiiiii, kubbi neheeeeeeeee!) nd i hanvn't seen ti in ages! 've neva cried so much!! lol, the first time i saw it i was lke 6/7, so how come i only cry now? i blame it on my retarded reactions lol! ok......now i've blogged , what do i do HEYA JOOLS! hope ur havin a nice time in malta! *scowls at mum then runs off to buy a new present* i should really give my mum a lecture on how NOT to use my friends presents. not that 'm keeping count, but it's like 4 presents that she's either ruined, used, or given to one of her friends with the excuse - 'oh sorry, i thought u bought it for when a birthday comes up and u don't have time to get a present'. lmao, i don't think that far into things luv. lool, i don't think there is a potty enuff person werthy enuff of being my mum then her:P the great thing about off stead, she too busy to remember, plus, wheneva she's under any sort of stress, it means that we've got plenty of junk food, a.k.a, chocolate and fizzy drinks! ok, gonna go now. :O OMG!!! i'ts like half 3!! BLODDY HELL!! i thought it was 12 or somehting!WOAH!
